content.raw:
Since the Multisense plugin was merged, I am seeing intermittent seg-faults on startup, sometimes with the following console message:

~~~
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'image_transport::Exception'
  what():  No plugins found! Does `rospack plugins --attrib=plugin image_transport` find any packages?
~~~

A quick backtrace:

~~~
Thread 40 (Thread 0x7fff242bc700 (LWP 12862)):
#0  0x00007ffff68b2c37 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
#1  0x00007ffff68b6028 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007ffff71bd535 in __gnu_cxx::__verbose_terminate_handler() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007ffff71bb6d6 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007ffff71bb703 in std::terminate() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007ffff71bb922 in __cxa_throw () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007fff26031d37 in image_transport::Publisher::Publisher(ros::NodeHandle&, std::string const&, unsigned int, boost::function<void (image_transport::SingleSubscriberPublisher const&)> const&, boost::function<void (image_transport::SingleSubscriberPublisher const&)> const&, boost::shared_ptr<void> const&, bool, boost::shared_ptr<pluginlib::ClassLoader<image_transport::PublisherPlugin> > const&) () from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libimage_transport.so
#7  0x00007fff2601fa7e in image_transport::ImageTransport::advertise(std::string const&, unsigned int, boost::function<void (image_transport::SingleSubscriberPublisher const&)> const&, boost::function<void (image_transport::SingleSubscriberPublisher const&)> const&, boost::shared_ptr<void> const&, bool) () from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libimage_transport.so
#8  0x00007fff2677c75d in gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils::LoadThread() () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#9  0x00007fff267ab2c9 in boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>::operator()(gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*) const
    () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#10 0x00007fff267bceae in void boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> >::operator()<boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list0>(boost::_bi::type<void>, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>&, boost::_bi::list0&, int) () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#11 0x00007fff267bc1a7 in boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> > >::operator()() () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#12 0x00007fff267baaec in boost::detail::thread_data<boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> > > >::run() ()
   from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#13 0x00007ffff42dba4a in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.54.0
#14 0x00007ffff55b6184 in start_thread (arg=0x7fff242bc700) at pthread_create.c:312
#15 0x00007ffff697637d in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:111
~~~

other threads:

~~~
Thread 39 (Thread 0x7fff24abd700 (LWP 12861)):
#0  0x00007ffff696dc53 in select () at ../sysdeps/unix/syscall-template.S:81
#1  0x00007fffd21b6498 in XmlRpc::XmlRpcDispatch::work(double) () from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so

   from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so

    () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#11 0x00007fff267bceae in void boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> >::operator()<boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list0>(boost::_bi::type<void>, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>&, boost::_bi::list0&, int) () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#12 0x00007fff267bc1a7 in boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> > >::operator()() () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so

#14 0x00007ffff42dba4a in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.54.0
#15 0x00007ffff55b6184 in start_thread (arg=0x7fff24abd700) at pthread_create.c:312
#16 0x00007ffff697637d in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:111

content.html:
Since the Multisense plugin was merged, I am seeing intermittent seg-faults on startup, sometimes with the following console message:

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'image_transport::Exception'
  what():  No plugins found! Does `rospack plugins --attrib=plugin image_transport` find any packages?

A quick backtrace:

Thread 40 (Thread 0x7fff242bc700 (LWP 12862)):
#0  0x00007ffff68b2c37 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
#1  0x00007ffff68b6028 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007ffff71bd535 in __gnu_cxx::__verbose_terminate_handler() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007ffff71bb6d6 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007ffff71bb703 in std::terminate() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007ffff71bb922 in __cxa_throw () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007fff26031d37 in image_transport::Publisher::Publisher(ros::NodeHandle&, std::string const&, unsigned int, boost::function<void (image_transport::SingleSubscriberPublisher const&)> const&, boost::function<void (image_transport::SingleSubscriberPublisher const&)> const&, boost::shared_ptr<void> const&, bool, boost::shared_ptr<pluginlib::ClassLoader<image_transport::PublisherPlugin> > const&) () from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libimage_transport.so
#7  0x00007fff2601fa7e in image_transport::ImageTransport::advertise(std::string const&, unsigned int, boost::function<void (image_transport::SingleSubscriberPublisher const&)> const&, boost::function<void (image_transport::SingleSubscriberPublisher const&)> const&, boost::shared_ptr<void> const&, bool) () from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libimage_transport.so
#8  0x00007fff2677c75d in gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils::LoadThread() () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#9  0x00007fff267ab2c9 in boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>::operator()(gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*) const
    () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#10 0x00007fff267bceae in void boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> >::operator()<boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list0>(boost::_bi::type<void>, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>&, boost::_bi::list0&, int) () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#11 0x00007fff267bc1a7 in boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> > >::operator()() () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#12 0x00007fff267baaec in boost::detail::thread_data<boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> > > >::run() ()
   from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#13 0x00007ffff42dba4a in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.54.0
#14 0x00007ffff55b6184 in start_thread (arg=0x7fff242bc700) at pthread_create.c:312
#15 0x00007ffff697637d in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:111

other threads:

Thread 39 (Thread 0x7fff24abd700 (LWP 12861)):

#1  0x00007fffd21b6498 in XmlRpc::XmlRpcDispatch::work(double) () from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so

   from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so
#3  0x00007fffd2852491 in ros::master::execute(std::string const&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue const&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue&, bool) () from /opt/ros/indigo/lib/libroscpp.so

#12 0x00007fff267bc1a7 in boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> > >::operator()() () from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#13 0x00007fff267baaec in boost::detail::thread_data<boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::GazeboRosCameraUtils*> > > >::run() ()
   from /root/ws/install/lib/libgazebo_ros_camera_utils.so
#14 0x00007ffff42dba4a in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.54.0
#15 0x00007ffff55b6184 in start_thread (arg=0x7fff24abd700) at pthread_create.c:312
#16 0x00007ffff697637d in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:111
